column5: Anyone fished Little Savant Lake with Troy and Penny Sawyer. We hopefully will be flying in next June after 2 years of cancellations. Just wondering what to expect from the lake?
Is that by the big savant lake?never heard of little savant lake.

Well if its Troy and Penny then Little Savant sits on the north end of Savant Lake. As far as Canadian lakes go its about 1300 acres, relatively shallow, probably 40 feet at the deepest. Not at all familiar with it. take a look on Canada's Fish On-Line site. Walleye and Northern Lake.

Have fished Savant lake many years and caught walleyes as far up the river as we could go. Little savant would have been a few miles further north. I would expect decent walleye and northern fishing on Little Savant. All of the sawyers a great folk, Troy and Penny will take good care of you.
